resources.string:
This is Dulce Shoe Store and we are happy to have you as our client!


Please take a minute to read the instructions and then enjoy our items!
1) In the Shoe List you will be able all the shoes you\'ve added to your list.
2) By clicking in the "+" button in the shoe list you will be able to navigate to the Shoe Details screen and you will be able to insert a new shoe into your list.

3) In the Shoe Details screen please inset all the needed information about your desired shoe. Then click "Save" to save this shoe and see it on the list or "Cancel" to cancel this action and navigate back to the Shoe List screen.
